Hub Ivoire Tech a pour vocation d'être l: Hub Ivoire Tech aims to be the largest Startup Campus in Africa. It brings together an ecosystem of incubators, accelerators, investors, experts, and entrepreneurs to stimulate innovation and transform ideas into concrete successes in Ivory Coast and beyond.
Nous offrons une gamme complète de servi: We offer a full range of services to support entrepreneurs at every stage of their development: incubation and acceleration programs (with coaching, mentoring, and masterclasses), modern coworking spaces, equipped meeting rooms, relaxation areas, innovation fablab, as well as administrative support to facilitate your procedures.
Comment puis-je réserver une visite du c: How can I book a campus tour?
Il vous suffit de remplir le formulaire: Simply fill out the visit reservation form on our site, providing your contact details, the desired date and time, and the purpose of your visit. Once your request is submitted, our team will contact you to confirm and finalize your appointment.
Qui peut bénéficier de vos programmes d': Who can benefit from your support programs?
Nos programmes s'adressent aux startups,: Our programs are aimed at startups, project holders, and entrepreneurs looking to bring their ideas to life. Whether you are in the creation phase or in full growth, Hub Ivoire Tech offers tailored support to boost your development through a network of experts and strategic partners.
Comment rester informé·e des actualités: How to stay informed about news and events?
Pour être tenu·e au courant de nos derni: To stay updated on our latest news, training, hackathons, and other events, subscribe to our newsletter and activate notifications via WhatsApp. You will receive all important information and opportunities offered by Hub Ivoire Tech directly in your email inbox or on your phone.
